articles.author: Delfin Dioquino
articles.title: E-Gilas back in action for FIBA Esports Open III - Rappler
articles.description: E-Gilas Pilipinas, the Southeast Asia champion of the inaugural FIBA Esports Open, looks to repeat its winning ways over 5 other teams
articles.content: The Filipino crew is also comprised of Philippe Herrero IV, Aljon Cruzin, Custer Galas, Ian Santiago, Arnie Sison, and Clark Banzon.

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Singapore braces for deluge of container ships sailing from Suez - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (Bloomberg): One of Asia’s busiest ports is preparing for an influx of ships after a week-long blockage at the Suez Canal.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE (Bloomberg): One of Asias busiest ports is preparing for an influx of ships after a week-long blockage at the Suez Canal.
